mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mental_health_data WHERE cht_x_cn REGEXP '^(미취학|초등|중학|고등)'
SELECT * FROM mental_health_data WHERE cht_x_cn REGEXP '^(대학|청소년아님)'

SELECT CASE WHEN cht_x_cn = '미취학' THEN '미취학' WHEN cht_x_cn LIKE '초등%' THEN '초등학생' WHEN cht_x_cn LIKE '중학%' THEN '중학생' WHEN cht_x_cn LIKE '고등%' THEN '고등학생' WHEN cht_x_cn LIKE '대학%' THEN '대학생' WHEN cht_x_cn = '청소년아님' THEN '청소년아님' END AS age_group, ROUND(AVG(cht_vl), 2) AS avg_mental_score FROM mental_health_data WHERE cht_se_nm = '정신건강' AND ( cht_x_cn = '미취학' OR cht_x_cn LIKE '초등%' OR cht_x_cn LIKE '중학%' OR cht_x_cn LIKE '고등%' OR cht_x_cn LIKE '대학%' OR cht_x_cn = '청소년아님' ) GROUP BY age_group ORDER BY FIELD(age_group, '미취학', '초등학생', '중학생', '고등학생', '대학생', '청소년아님')
